column1: One day there was a boy who came to visit the family who owned the birds
column2: and very soon he went to see the big cage. He had never seen anything like it before. He had never been so close to birds that were sitting on trees or hopping about among the branches. If the birds at home were as tame as these
column3: he could knock over lots of them
column4: he thought.There was one that seemed tamer than any of the rest. It came up close to him and said: "Tweet! Tweet!"The boy got a little stick and pushed it through the wires at little Tweet
column5: and struck her. Poor little Tweet was frightened and hurt. She flew up to a branch of the tree and sat there
column6: feeling very badly. When the boy found he could not reach her any more with his stick
